---
title: "Bar Plot with 2 Factors & Gradient Color"
output:
  prettydoc::html_pretty:
    theme: cayman
    highlight: github
---


```{r}
library(ggplot2)
df=data.frame(time=as.factor(rep(0.5:9.5,each=10)), roi=rep(1:10,10), area=runif(100, 5.0, 7.5))

df$time <- factor(df$time, levels=rev(levels(df$time)))

ggplot(data=df, aes(y=factor(roi), x=time, fill = area)) + theme_minimal()  + coord_flip() +
  geom_tile(colour = "white", width = .9, height = 1) + scale_fill_gradient(low="blue", high="red")
```
